github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: format:{type}: ({scope}) {emoji}{subject};type in [feat(✨),fix(🐛),docs(📝),style(💄),refactor(♻️),perf(⚡️),test(🧪),ci(💚),chore(🤖),revert(⏪️),release(🔖)];scope=project/module,lowercase,optional;emoji=match type;subject=imperative,lowercase,no '.',no pascal/sentence/start/upper-case,max 72 chars;header max 72 chars;body/footer optional
